name.baseName: 土壤修复;异位修复;水泥窑协同处置;运行阶段;水泥粉磨

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This industrial process is utilized for soil remediation purposes through off-site treatment in cement kilns during the operating phase, encompassing cement grinding. The cement plant operates a modern dry-process production line with a capacity of 4,000 tons per day, yielding an annual output of 1.9 million tons of cement and 1.5 million tons of clinker. With a mining area of 0.448 km2, the plant has an annual limestone production capacity of 2 million tons. Advanced RSP five-stage pre-decomposition technology is employed in the production process. Hazardous waste is transported by designated trucks over a route exclusive to freight vehicles. The mining area is approximately 1.5 km from the plant, while the distance for waste transport is about 50 km. The conventional cement manufacturing process includes raw and auxiliary material mining and transport, raw meal preparation, coal powder preparation, clinker calcination, and cement grinding. By incorporating waste disposal, waste materials such as contaminated soil, digested sludge, and waste oil sludge can be utilized as alternative raw materials and fuels, conserving limestone and coal. During the cement kiln co-processing, the operation phase mainly involves the crushing and grinding of limestone and gypsum for cement production.

水泥厂拥有一条4000t/d规模的现代化干法生产线，年生产水泥190万t，熟料150万t．公司自有矿山面积0.448km2，年生产石灰石能力200万t.生产工艺采用具有先进水平的RSP五级窑外分解技术．危险废物均采用汽车运输方式，配置危险品专用车辆，行车路线为货车专用线.矿山至厂区的运输距离约1.5km，废弃物的运输距离约50km．常规水泥的生产过程主要包括原辅材料的幵采及运输、生料制备、煤粉制备、熟料煅烧和水泥粉磨等阶段， 添加废弃物处置环节后， 废弃物（污染土壤、消化污泥、废油泥等）可以用作替代原料和替代燃料，以节省石灰石和煤炭等原材料。水泥窑协同处置，运行阶段，水泥粉磨过程，主要是石灰石、石膏的破碎、混合及水泥粉磨过程。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This industrial process is utilized for soil remediation purposes through off-site treatment in cement kilns during the operating phase, encompassing cement grinding. The cement plant operates a modern dry-process production line with a capacity of 4,000 tons per day, yielding an annual output of 1.9 million tons of cement and 1.5 million tons of clinker. With a mining area of 0.448 km2, the plant has an annual limestone production capacity of 2 million tons. Advanced RSP five-stage pre-decomposition technology is employed in the production process. Hazardous waste is transported by designated trucks over a route exclusive to freight vehicles. The mining area is approximately 1.5 km from the plant, while the distance for waste transport is about 50 km. The conventional cement manufacturing process includes raw and auxiliary material mining and transport, raw meal preparation, coal powder preparation, clinker calcination, and cement grinding. By incorporating waste disposal, waste materials such as contaminated soil, digested sludge, and waste oil sludge can be utilized as alternative raw materials and fuels, conserving limestone and coal. During the cement kiln co-processing, the operation phase mainly involves the crushing and grinding of limestone and gypsum for cement production.

该工业过程用于土壤修复，通过在运行阶段的水泥窑异位处理过程中进行，包括水泥粉磨。水泥厂运行一条日产量为4000吨的现代化干法生产线，年产水泥190万吨，熟料150万吨。拥有0.448平方公里的矿山，年产石灰石200万吨。生产过程采用先进的RSP五级窑外分解技术。危险废物由专用货车运输，运输路线专门用于货车。矿山距离厂区大约1.5公里，废弃物运输距离约为50公里。常规水泥生产过程主要包括开采及运输原辅材料、生料制备、煤粉制备、熟料煅烧和水泥粉磨等阶段。通过加入废弃物处置环节，废弃物（如污染土壤、消化污泥、废油泥等）可以作为替代原料或燃料使用，以节约石灰石和煤炭等原材料资源。水泥窑协同处置运行阶段主要包括石灰石、石膏的破碎与混合以及水泥粉磨过程。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment, attention should be paid to the sourcing of alternative materials and fuels, ensuring they align with actual waste inputs in terms of composition and availability. Methodologies regarding the inclusion of transportation impacts, raw material extraction, and the end-of-life phase of materials should be consistently applied. Co-processing in cement kilns has specific emissions profiles that must be considered, and this dataset should not be used interchangeably with traditional cement manufacturing without accounting for the differences in environmental impacts. Modellers should also account for the system boundaries and geographical scope of the data provided, to ensure relevance and accuracy in their assessments.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，应注意替代材料和燃料的来源，确保它们在成分和可用性方面与实际废物输入相符。应一致性地采用有关运输影响、原材料提取以及材料终生阶段的方法论。水泥窑共处理具有特定排放特征，必须在考虑这些特征的前提下使用该数据集，并且不应将其与传统水泥生产数据互换使用，而不考虑环境影响差异。模型构建者还应考虑所提供数据的系统边界和地理范围，以确保在评估中的相关性和准确性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
